title: Sharing Why You Love God
itunes:author: Guest: Dr. Meg Meeker
itunes:summary:
Rather than hearing you preach about staying away from what's wrong, your child wants to know that your relationship with God is authentic. John and Danny share how you can have conversations with your kids about God, and balance them with discussing what's right and wrong. Featuring Dr. Meg Meeker.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Receive the book "Raising a Strong Daughter in a Toxic Culture" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2022-04-28?refcd=1454305

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/sharing-why-you-love-god/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/navigating-a-toxic-culture-with-your-daughter-digital-product/?refcd=1454305

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
